## Data Exploration

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r load data}
data <- read.csv("data/healthcare_dataset.csv")
```

```{r}
is.numeric(data$Age)
is.numeric(data$Billing.Amount)
```
```{r}
# column names
names(data)
```

```{r}
# admission counts by gender
ggplot(data, aes(x=Admission.Type, fill=Gender)) +
  geom_bar(position='stack')
```

```{r}
# billing by 
ggplot(data, aes(x=Admission.Type,y=Billing.Amount)) +
  stat_summary(fun.y=mean, geom='bar', fill='lightblue')
  
```
